file_content.text: The Empire graciously welcomes you to Voss Orbital. Ambassador Yoran deeply regrets that he was unable to greet you personally.
I've been instructed to emphasize the delicate situation you're walking into, before you head for the surface.
The ambassador is concerned that your business could jeopardize the Empire's interests on Voss.
My employer would argue otherwise.
I'm on Imperial business.
It's just that your kind aren't known for stepping lightly, you understand.
Whatever problems you've got here, I'm sure I can take care of them for the right price.
He's got no reason to worry.
You don't understand. Every single thing you--we do here is scrutinized and used as leverage in negotiations.
If you aren't my contact, quit wasting my time.
Get lost, lackey.
I must insist. I've been given explicit instructions to make sure you understand the gravity of the situation.
The Voss are stubbornly isolationist and abundantly aware of their own value to the Republic and the Empire. It is vital that the Empire fosters goodwill.
You must remain on your best behavior.
I'll conduct myself accordingly.
There won't be any problems.
It's the nature of your profession that has the ambassador concerned.
You can stop harping on it.
Good. There are a few laws you need to be aware of.
And just what is the planet's value, while we're on the subject?
Why are they so important?
Well, its location and some unique resources, but our lords seem particularly interested in its people and their connection to the Force.
The Voss abhor discord and don't tolerate violence within their territory. You'll mix peacefully with the enemy here.
The Voss revere their Mystics; deal carefully with them or, preferably, not at all. Also, outsiders are barred from Voss-Ka proper.
Don't pick fights. Be polite. Stay out of Voss-Ka. Understood.
I can handle that.
Should I be taking notes?
This advice or a lecture?
No, no. Those are the only specific points, just use common sense.
Pretend like I've never been here before.
Slow down. Mystics? Voss-Ka?
Oops, I'm sorry. Mystics are the spiritual leaders of the Voss. Healers and prophets, the Voss follow their visions without question.
Outsiders aren't restricted from traveling the planet, but access to the Voss's home is restricted to the Alien Enclave.
I will let Ambassador Yoran know to expect you. Head to his office once you've landed. Have a safe visit.
Talky-man gone? Blizz get bored, stop listening. Blizz follow boss's lead.
Let's get going, Blizz.
Noted.
Blizz right behind boss!
I started tuning out myself.
You weren't the only one.
It be okay. Boss smart, not need talky-man to know what to do.
Keep your mouth shut and fall in line.
Why are you talking?
Yes, boss....
Don't forget, this little kibosh on violence works both ways. I'm sure we can have some fun with that.
Business before pleasure, Gault.
The job comes first.
You should really try mixing the two.
It's probably best we don't egg anyone on.
Better behave ourselves.
Just looking on the bright side.
Let's go step on some toes.
Hadn't considered that.
I'll leave that part to you, wouldn't want to scuff my shoes.
Aww, we're disturbin' the peace. Ain't that a shame.
You follow my lead; I'm not taking any chances.
Don't jeopardize my job.
I follow if I feel like it.
Try to behave. I'm not busting you out of prison again.
Itching to get arrested?
Ain't nobody gonna put me away.
Let's turn this place upside down.
We'll do more than disturb it.
You an' me gonna get along just fine.
That's more like it.
Empire's stepping lightly, smells like trouble.
They've probably got good reason for it.
We'll follow their example.
That's what worries me.
Imperials only smile when they're up to something.
Agreed.
Or when they're nervous.
Let them tip-toe around. I make my own rules.
Doesn't matter to us.
Don't I know.
Working out so far.
I know.
So, we all have to play nice.
At least until we assess the situation.
If it's necessary.
I wouldn't count on anyone buying us the first round.
That might be overstating it.
That's why I've got you around, big guy.
There's bound to be a couple of guys willing to push their luck.
Hey, I bet I'd fair pretty well if you weren't around to scare off all the cantina crawlers.
Push comes to shove, I'll leave this place a smoking crater.
I'm not taking any lip.
Sometimes I wonder what I see in you.
I vote we enjoy whatever peace and quiet we can get.
You're still talking.
I'm not asking again. Go away.
If--if you cause an incident because I didn't warn you, I'll be directly responsible. I--I'll be quick.
The cardinal rules: no outsiders allowed in Voss-Ka, no fighting in front of the Voss, and please just avoid the Mystics all together.
That's it...! Please don't kill me.
Consider me warned.
You've done your duty.
Whatever they're paying you to pester me, it ain't enough.
You got shafted on this job.
I'm sorry to have bothered you. I'll go inform the ambassador that you're coming.
Go on and change your pants.
Leave before I change my mind.
Thank you! Thank you, I'll let the ambassador know you're coming.
How boss use blaster like remote? Put talky-man on fast forward?
You're hopeless, you know that? Funny, but hopeless.
Nothin' like the smell of fear.
Thin line between brave and stupid.
I'm pretty sure that's exactly why they sent him.
